title: Joachim ("JZ") Zell - Color Scientist
description:
EPISODE 19 - JOACHIM ("JZ") ZELL - Color Scientist

Team Deakins sit down with JZ and dig deeply into the color science of it all. His credits include MULAN, 1917, AD ASTRA, FIRST MAN, and BLADE RUNNER 2049. We talk LUTs, resolution, color space, pixels, work flow and lots more. He really knows his stuff!’
